featured.text: Yusra eventually settled in Germany and has since worked to inspire others to pursue their Popole was granted asylum in 2014 by dreams.

definition.zh_def: 庇護，尤其是對政治迫害者的保護或避難所。
definition.en_def: Protection granted to individuals in a foreign country due to persecution in their home country.
definition.example: The refugee sought asylum in a neighboring country to escape the violence at home.
